text: aur baraabar nahi do darya, ye mitha hai jo pyaas bujaata hai, peene mein khush gawaar aur ye dosra khaari hai, kadwa, tum un duno mein se taaza gosht khaate ho aur wo zewaraath nikaalte ho, jinhe tum pehente ho aur aap dekhte hai ke badi badi kashtiyaa paani ko cheerne phaadne waali, in daryaao mein hai, ta ke tum us ka fazl dhundo aur ta ke tum us ka shukr karo
